description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services requires a contract to provide fresh fruit and vegetables.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement for RMSO Fresh Fruit and Vegetables
=====================================================

### Tender Details

| **Field Name** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS4479738090 |
| Reference Number | WS4479738090-Doc4505955649 |
| Publication Date | 2024-05-01 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-05-16T14:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | N/A |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2025-05-31 |

### Tender Description

*   Procurement Category: Government Division (GD)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
*   Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders participating in the following international trade agreements:

*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Regions of Delivery

*   Nova Scotia
*   Newfoundland and Labrador
*   New Brunswick

### Contracting Entity and End User Entity

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   End User Entities: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), Department of National Defence (DND), and Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

### Contact Information

*   Contact Person: Tara Sheppard ( ela-lui/she-her/hers)
*   Contact Email: tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Resources

*   Notice URL: https://dis
